Name: Overlord-class DropShip
Details: One of the largest DropShips still available in the Inner Sphere and Periphery, an Overlord can carry a full battalion of BattleMechs or ground vehicles, and a squadron of AeroSpace Fighters, with a total mass of 9,700 tons. Due to their scarcity, Overlords are usually kept out of the frontlines after disembarking their 'Mechs and are used as a command posts and mobile bases. They are also heavily armed when compared to other transport DropShips.
